ca.proj.game.level.tiles

Class AnimatedTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.proj.game.level.tiles.Tile
      • ca.proj.game.level.tiles.BasicTile
        • ca.proj.game.level.tiles.AnimatedTile

  • public class AnimatedTile
extends BasicTile
    AnimatedTile.java switches between rendering different tiles to achieve an animation effect.
